title: How-To Guide for Implementing AI Search in a React Application
description: This guide provides a comprehensive overview of how to implement an AI Search feature in a React application, including setup and error handling strategies.
author: Anonymous

blocks.content: The primary use cases for the AI Search component include:

Displaying AI Search Interface
Handling User Queries
Displaying Recommended Articles
Toggling Legacy Documentation
Error Messaging
Ensure you have the following dependencies installed in your project:

React
Framer Motion
Next.js
Custom components
Utility functions
Implement error handling to manage scenarios where the AI Search feature is disabled or returns no results.
If the AI Search feature is disabled, a message is displayed to inform users.
Make sure to test the implementation thoroughly to ensure a smooth user experience.
